doc.name: AbstractStation
doc.description: This abstract actor models a Station. It receives a train and send it out. If this station is in junction, it should have address of the next stations in form of "symbolId". If it has more than one output channel, then routes the train based on moving map of the train.
doc.author: Maryam Bagheri
doc.port: The input port, which is a multiport.
The output port, which is a multiport consisting of RecordTokens.
doc.property: The station ID. The initial value is an integer with value -1.
The settling time. The initial value is an integer with the value 1.
The line symbol, which is a string.
True if this is an input junction.
True if this station is broken.

The neighbors of this station. The display name is "idOfNeighborStationOrJunction". The initial value of this parameter is a string consisting of the open curly bracket followed by the close curly bracket: "{}"
